channel.title: Chaning shop name plz help
channel.description: ok in my server i have a shop i want to change the name of it you know like it says barrow shop or whatever can somebody please tell me where i go to change that ive been looking and i cant find it it will be greatly apreaciated.

item.title: Chaning shop name plz help
item.dc:creator: @kepoly kepoly
item.description:
@kepoly wrote:

[quote=“Sebo, post:2, topic:121575”]Go into Shops.cfg, and find the original shop name, For example Santa_Rare_Shop, delete it, and change it to what you want.

Sebo [/quote]yes do that but make shure ts not to long it messes shit up if its like rareshopofthenewrunescapeversion1.2

Read full topic

item.title: Chaning shop name plz help
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Go into Shops.cfg, and find the original shop name, For example Santa_Rare_Shop, delete it, and change it to what you want.

Sebo

Read full topic
